N1.Q: USA gam ii zuih thukhun Upadi thupi pen bang hiam?

N2.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi in bangteng vaan hiam?
N2.A:
Gam-uk ding kumpi phut 
 Americans mite’ septheih leh ngahtheih peuhmah peelhem saklo (protects) 
 Ki-ukzia ding gee

N6.A:
Suaktataka thugentheihna 
 Suaktataka Biakpiaktheihna 
 Suaktataka Kikaihkhoptheihna  
 Suaktataka Laigelh leh hawmtheihna 
 Suaktataka Kumpi tungah lungkimlohna gentheih/pulaktheihna

N7.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi bangzah vei kipuahpha ta hiam?

N8.A:
(Great Britain te kiangpan) suahtak tangkona  
 (Great Britain te kiangpan) suahtak pulakkhia

N9.Q: Suahtakna Thutangkopi in hong phal hamphatna thunihte bang a hia?
N9.A:

 Kiphalna

N10.A: Biakna khat peuhpeuh ah na utleh biathei/bialothei lel a omna

N11.Q: United States ah kizang neih-le-lam,silh-le-teen khantohna (sipuazi paizia) ah bangdan in pai hiam?
N11.A:
Aziansian sanit (Sumneite bulphuh) paizia 
 Sumzuaknamun thupitsakna (Zaykuat sipuazi)

N12.Q: Upadi tawh ki-uk cih bang hiam?
N12.A:
Mikim in upadi zui/mang ding 
  Makaite in zong upadi zui/mang ding 
 Kumpi in zong upadi zui/mang ding 
 Kuamahpeuh upadi huamkhakloh omtuansaklo ding

N25.A:
Amau pyine ah miphazah tawh kisai hang 
 Amau pyine ah mipibup atamzawk hang

 Trump

N41.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi nuai ah aana neihna Gambup Kumpi (Federal Government) in nei hi. Gambup Kumpi neihtheih aana khat bang hiam?
N41.A:
Sum khenkhiasak 
 Galsim ding khensat 
 Galkap phuansak 
 Gamdang tawh thukimna laipi bawl

N42.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi nuai ah septheih aana neihna pyinete ah kipia hi. Tua aana khat bang ahi hiam?
N42.A:
Sang leh pilsinna vaihawm  
 Palik nei thei 
 Meiphelhna leh humbitna vaihawm thei 
 Mawtawhawl letmat piathei 
 Gam leh lei zatna vaihawmthei

N48.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi ah li veitak kipuahphatna ah kuate in mee piathei dingte cih kilemthak hi. Tua lak ah khat gen in.
N48.A:
Gammi kum 18 a pha leh a tungsiahte 
 Mee piak theih nading sumpiak kullo. 
 Numei pasal a kuapeuh in mee piathei 
 Kua minam hitaleh gammi pasal khatpeuh in mee piathei

N49.Q: United States gammi bek ii tavuan khat bang hiam?
N49.A:
Thukhen semthei 
 Federal (Pyine) kiteelna ah mee piathei

N50.Q: United States gammi khat ii ngahtheih hamphatna khat bang hiam?
N50.A:
Federal kiteelna ah thu neithe 
 Federal ah meekuang lui thei

N51.Q: United States ah a teeng khempeuh ii ngahtheih hamphatna thu nih bang hiam?
N51.A:
Suakta takin thu pulaakthei 
 Suakta takin thu genthei

N52.Q: Zahtak piakding Kamciam (Pledge of Alegiance) I neih ciang’ bang tungah thumaan citak ding I hiam?
N52.A:

N53.Q: United States gammi khat na suah ciangin na kam kiciamna khat bang ahi hiam?
N53.A:
Gamdangte tungah muanna leh suanna nei nawnlo ding

 United States ii Upadi zui ding

Meepia 
 Naingnganzi party khat peuhpeuh ah kihel  
 Mee suaina ah huh 
 Civil kipawlna khat ah kizom  
 Veeng kipawlna ah kihel

N57.A:
Kum 18 phak ah

N58.Q: Gamdang mite America ah hong paina ahang khat bang hiam?
N58.A:
Suaktanuam 
 Naingnganzi sepna ah suakta 
 Biakna ah suahtakna

N59.A:
American Indians te

Phiangsiah piak tamluat hang

Silate suakta sak (Silate Khahkhiatna Pulakkhiatna)
